price: Sabõda haka, kada ka ƙarfafa zaton Allah Mai sãɓa wa'adinSa ne ga ManzanninSa. Lalle ne Allah ne Mabuwãyi, Ma'abũcin azãbar rãmuwa.
arabic: فَلَا تَحۡسَبَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡلِفَ وَعۡدِهِۦ رُسُلَهُۥٓۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٞ ذُو ٱنتِقَامٖ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: falā taḥsabanna al-laha mukh'lifa waʿdihi rusulahu inna al-laha ʿazīzun dhū intiqāmin
